text: Imo fresh pasta for lasagna is so worth it

elements.text: Imo fresh pasta for lasagna is so worth it

text:
It's also much easier than other sorts as you don't need to worry about cutting (since step 1 of most pastas us a flat sheet)
and you don't need to worry about sticking
